Articles.Content:
landed my *slick* interplanetary rover with skycrane

i had fun building it and it was interesting getting new ideas from other people's rovers that i saw on google

its on a sandbox save, but its still intriguing seeing it on the red planet

In Duna: https://ibb.co/b7vKKxP

In Duna w/ skycrane: https://ibb.co/MR409LZ

That is.... a sky crane. You can make it smaller if you want by angling twitch engines on top and using the rover wheels as your landing legs. Great craft though, my first rover to duna was dropped from the lander before landing. The rover did not survive the impact

13 hours ago, Daedalus3000 said:

That is.... a sky crane. You can make it smaller if you want by angling twitch engines on top and using the rover wheels as your landing legs. Great craft though, my first rover to duna was dropped from the lander before landing. The rover did not survive the impact 

its not really a skycrane i guess but it could be if i added some fuel tanks and twitch engines  (which i did for the skycrane that landed it since im an absolute genius)

here is another pic about the rover from a view from the top https://ibb.co/SBsSq8R

sad to hear about your first duna rover
